title: Steve Jobs was pondering an Apple Car back in 2008 | Trusted Reviews
description: ![steve jobsiphone]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * Early this year, Apple executive Jeff Williams coyly called the car “theultimate mobile device,” but the company is yet to make any official statementon the matter.
